course.subject: LIFS
course.name: Biotechnology Project Research II
course.description: Continuation of LIFS 4973. Students will undertake a research project of their choice in an area of biotechnology under faculty supervision: design of experiments, analysis of data, submission of a written report and poster presentation of research results. Approval of the course instructor is needed for students to enroll in this course. For BIOT students only.
course.prerequisites: LIFS 4973 OR SCIE 4500
